thread.title: Victoria’s Secret: 2 PINK Bralettes or Sports Bras, Sunglasses & Water Bottle Just $20 (Reg. $84.90)
thread.title_full: Victoria’s Secret: 2 PINK Bralettes or Sports Bras, Sunglasses & Water Bottle Just $20 (Reg. $84.90)

author: Mary (Stellar Sidekick)
title: Victoria’s Secret: 2 PINK Bralettes or Sports Bras, Sunglasses & Water Bottle Just $20 (Reg. $84.90)
text:
Just a few days left to snag this *HOT* deal! As I mentioned here , Victoria’s Secret is offering up a free 32oz PINK Water Bottle ($24.95 value) AND Bottle Opener Sunglasses ($14.95 value) with any PINK purchase (excluding clearance) through February 17th – valid both in-store or online with promo code PINKSUNNY at checkout.

If you’re headed in-store, one *HOT* deal you may want to snag are select Bralettes and Sports Bras on sale for 2 for $20 (must buy 2) and these items qualify for the free Bottle & Sunglasses!

These Bralettes and Bras are regularly priced at up to $22.50 each, so this seems like a *HOT* deal considering you’re paying just $10 each whenever you buy two AND getting the freebies!
Did you see these Victoria’s Secret deals ?
